attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am petitioning that the surface of all roads at '30 mph limit' to be resurfaced' with a speed reducing compound, that, prevents all motorised objects from traveling faster than 30 mph.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
